testcase.name: MemoryTool > setGeminiMdFilename > should update currentGeminiMdFilename when a valid new name is provided
MemoryTool > setGeminiMdFilename > should not update currentGeminiMdFilename if the new name is empty or whitespace
MemoryTool > setGeminiMdFilename > should handle an array of filenames
MemoryTool > performAddMemoryEntry (static method) > should create section and save a fact if file does not exist
MemoryTool > performAddMemoryEntry (static method) > should create section and save a fact if file is empty
MemoryTool > performAddMemoryEntry (static method) > should add a fact to an existing section
MemoryTool > performAddMemoryEntry (static method) > should add a fact to an existing empty section
MemoryTool > performAddMemoryEntry (static method) > should add a fact when other ## sections exist and preserve spacing
MemoryTool > performAddMemoryEntry (static method) > should correctly trim and add a fact that starts with a dash
MemoryTool > performAddMemoryEntry (static method) > should handle error from fsAdapter.writeFile

testcase.name: MemoryTool > execute (instance method) > should have correct name, displayName, description, and schema
MemoryTool > execute (instance method) > should call performAddMemoryEntry with correct parameters and return success
MemoryTool > execute (instance method) > should return an error if fact is empty
MemoryTool > execute (instance method) > should handle errors from performAddMemoryEntry
testcase.system-err: [MemoryTool] Error executing save_memory for fact "This will fail": [MemoryTool] Failed to add memory entry: Disk full

testcase.name: loadServerHierarchicalMemory > should return empty memory and count if no context files are found
loadServerHierarchicalMemory > should load only the global context file if present and others are not (default filename)
loadServerHierarchicalMemory > should load only the global custom context file if present and filename is changed
loadServerHierarchicalMemory > should load context files by upward traversal with custom filename
loadServerHierarchicalMemory > should load context files by downward traversal with custom filename
loadServerHierarchicalMemory > should load ORIGINAL_GEMINI_MD_FILENAME files by upward traversal from CWD to project root
loadServerHierarchicalMemory > should load ORIGINAL_GEMINI_MD_FILENAME files by downward traversal from CWD
loadServerHierarchicalMemory > should load and correctly order global, upward, and downward ORIGINAL_GEMINI_MD_FILENAME files
loadServerHierarchicalMemory > should ignore specified directories during downward scan
loadServerHierarchicalMemory > should respect MAX_DIRECTORIES_TO_SCAN_FOR_MEMORY during downward scan
loadServerHierarchicalMemory > should load extension context file paths
memoryImportProcessor > processImports > should process basic md file imports
memoryImportProcessor > processImports > should warn and fail for non-md file imports
memoryImportProcessor > processImports > should handle circular imports
memoryImportProcessor > processImports > should handle file not found errors
memoryImportProcessor > processImports > should respect max depth limit
memoryImportProcessor > processImports > should handle nested imports recursively
memoryImportProcessor > processImports > should handle absolute paths in imports
memoryImportProcessor > processImports > should handle multiple imports in same content
memoryImportProcessor > validateImportPath > should reject URLs
memoryImportProcessor > validateImportPath > should allow paths within allowed directories
memoryImportProcessor > validateImportPath > should reject paths outside allowed directories
memoryImportProcessor > validateImportPath > should handle multiple allowed directories
memoryImportProcessor > validateImportPath > should handle relative paths correctly
memoryImportProcessor > validateImportPath > should handle absolute paths correctly
